info.title: ShopAgain API
info.description:
# Introduction

This API is used for interacting with ShopAgain by third party apps. For authentication you need an `API Key` which can be obtained from the company.

# Authentication

pass

# Webhooks

tags.name: Product
tags.description: Products play a very important role at ShopAgain. We use them for recommeding new products in Email and SMS Campaigns and even in the widgets,

post.description: Only partners are allowed to programmatically create a new company.
Use this endpoint to create a contact at ShopAgain.
Use this endpoint to create a product at ShopAgain.

value.name: Shoe 1
value.description: A great pair of black sneakers suitable for every day use
value.description_html: A great pair of black sneakers suitable for every day use

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a product collection at ShopAgain.
Use this endpoint to create a cart at ShopAgain.
Use this endpoint to create a cart at ShopAgain.

client_details.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; SM-S908U Build/TP1A.220624.014; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/108.0.5359.128 Mobile Safari/537.36 Instagram 264.0.0.22.106 Android (33/13; 450dpi; 1080x2106; samsung; SM-S908U; b0q; qcom; en_US;430370695)

post.description: Use this endpoint to create a order at ShopAgain.

client_details.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; SM-S908U Build/TP1A.220624.014; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/108.0.5359.128 Mobile Safari/537.36 Instagram 264.0.0.22.106 Android (33/13; 450dpi; 1080x2106; samsung; SM-S908U; b0q; qcom; en_US;430370695)

api_key.description: api key to fetch store data, create discount codes etc

external_product_id.description: Product id on the store website (shopify or woocommerce product id)

description.description: Description as text with no html tags (this field is used in email campaigns)
examples: A great pair of black sneakers suitable for every day use

description_html.description: Description may contain html tags (field is not necessary)
examples: A great pair of black sneakers suitable for every day use

handle.description: Unique identifier in the url of the product page. if product page is /products/shoe-1, handle would be shoe-1

image_urls.description: List of urls of the product images

video_urls.description: List of urls of the product videos

variants.description: Variants of the product. See eaxample for the details

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was updated.

external_id.description: Store customer is called contact at ShopAgain

email.description: Email. Either email or phone number must be provided.

phone_number.description: Phone number. Either email or phone number must be provided.

video_urls.description: List of urls of the product videos

email_subscription_date.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the user subscribed to email.

sms_subscription_status.description: SMS subscription status. Same field is used for whatsapp subscription.

sms_subscription_date.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the user subscribed to SMS.

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was updated.

external_collection_id.description: Product collection id on the store website (shopify or woocommerce product id)

external_product_ids.description: List of external product ids in the collection

handle.description: Unique identifier in the url of the product page. if product page is /collections/shoes, handle would be shoes

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was updated.

published_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was created.

cart_token.description: Token or identifier for a cart

external_customer_id.description: Customer id at store associated with cart

external_product_ids.description: List of store product ids added to the cart

line_items.description: Items in the cart. Contains details of product, variant and quantity

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the cart was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the cart was updated.

external_customer_id.description: Customer id at store associated with cart

external_product_ids.description: List of store product ids added to the cart

item_count.description: Count of items in the checkout

total_price.description: Count of items in the checkout

abandoned_checkout_url.description: URL to recover an abanoned checkout

is_discounted.description: Has any discoun code been applied

extra_fields.description: Items in the cart and browser or client metadata.

client_details.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; SM-S908U Build/TP1A.220624.014; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/108.0.5359.128 Mobile Safari/537.36 Instagram 264.0.0.22.106 Android (33/13; 450dpi; 1080x2106; samsung; SM-S908U; b0q; qcom; en_US;430370695)

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was updated.

completed_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was completed.

closed_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was closed, usually a timeout date when checkout gets automatically closed.

external_customer_id.description: Customer id at store associated with cart

external_product_ids.description: List of store product ids added to the cart

item_count.description: Count of items in the checkout

total_price.description: Count of items in the checkout

subtotal_price.description: Count of items in the checkout

current_total_price.description: Total price after returns or partial cancellations

current_subtotal_price.description: Sub total price after returns or partial cancellations

current_total_discounts.description: Current Total discount given after returns or cancellations

current_total_tax.description: Current Tax after returns or cancellations

is_discounted.description: Has any discoun code been applied

order_status_url.description: URL to recover an abanoned checkout

extra_fields.description: Items in the cart and browser or client metadata.

client_details.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; SM-S908U Build/TP1A.220624.014; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/108.0.5359.128 Mobile Safari/537.36 Instagram 264.0.0.22.106 Android (33/13; 450dpi; 1080x2106; samsung; SM-S908U; b0q; qcom; en_US;430370695)

created_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was updated.

cancelled_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the checkout was completed.
